Motorball
FEEDBACK / ideas
What would you like to see in Motorball? Let us know! How to leave your ideas: 1. Use the command ! idea (without the space). This command only works within this channel. 2. Within the same message and on the same line, type a concise, good quality title for your idea. You will get a DM from the bot to give more information if needed. 3. There is an upvote thresh-hold on ideas. This means that if an idea gets 5 upvotes or more, a card in our project management tool, Codecks, will be made for the Noodlecake team to see (this does not mean that we will for sure 100% complete this!). If it does not get enough upvotes, it will not be added, so please be sure to put a lot of thought into your idea. Leaderboards will be posted in #ideas-leaderboard with the top 10 community ideas once a week on Fridays. Being in the top 10 doesn't necessarily mean that your idea will for sure be added into the game. Troll/joke ideas will be deleted and result in warning. Community board: https://open.codecks.io/motorball

@RgRdGr You don't follow what I'm saying. Checkmate 30-Oct-20 06:48 PM
Just here to agree with Nitro’s post and the rest above me suggesting that we have a set number of stat points to distribute to fit our style of play. I believe as is we currently have about 35 or 36 stat points set by default. Let the default stats be set as they currently are since most can agree it’s a good neutral starting point for all players but let us have the option to redistribute those points however we want and let it be available to all players on day 1 rather than something we achieve at the later levels to keep everything as open and fair as possible. I get the idea of charging to “respec” each time but i think to make it truly new player friendly AND keep the current player base interested, allow us all to tinker with our stats as much as we want with no charge. Between every match if we want. It would help new players adapt quicker and give the experienced players an extra thing to play around with. (edited)

Kay-Lynne 04-Nov-20 10:30 AM
Hey everyone! No surprise, but we're implementing a new feature/command here on this server that is already a thing on the Golf Blitz server, but figured it would be a good thing to add here too! You can now use a command to leave us your ideas. They will be added to a public board that everyone can see, including the Noodlecake team. How to leave your ideas: 1. Use the command ! idea (without the space). This command only works within this channel. 2. Within the same message and on the same line, type a concise, good quality title for your idea. You will get a DM from the bot to give more information if needed. 3. There is an upvote thresh-hold on ideas. This means that if an idea gets 5 upvotes or more, a card in our project management tool, Codecks, will be made for the Noodlecake team to see (this does not mean that we will for sure 100% complete this!). If it does not get enough upvotes, it will not be added, so please be sure to put a lot of thought into your idea. To upvote, use this symbol: ✅ Leaderboards will be posted in #ideas-leaderboard with the top 10 community ideas once a week on Fridays. Being in the top 10 doesn't necessarily mean that your idea will for sure be added into the game, but it is way more likely that we will see it and consider it. Troll/joke ideas will be deleted and will result in a warning. You can find the community board here: https://open.codecks.io/motorball (edited)
2
